recipesJson.name: Good fellas 1 -2 -3 ( Italian lemon cookie icecream)
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Updated........adding a lemon of your choice will help this recipe since we all know if fades quickly.......... Another simple 3 ingredient recipe so tasty and simple created for new comers just getting started in DIY  ... add your choice of sweetener

reviews.text: Solid dessert recipe. Unfortunately I think I let this steep too long and the lemon mostly muted out. But the cream is on point and there's a nice bakery note.

pageContext.name: Good fellas 1 -2 -3 ( Italian lemon cookie icecream)
